narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Carmel O'reardon is a Social Worker, Clinical provider based in Houston, TX. From 2020-11 through 2023-10, this provider received $401K in Medicaid payments across 6K claims serving 2K beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 94% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 90834 (90834). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Spending more than doubled from $23K in 2020 to $110K in 2023 (378% growth).
Saw a 5.6× spike in 2021 ($23K → $128K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
